Sequence Information.Peptide Name: BM173 (natural AMPs; Bacteriocin, Gram-positive bacteria, prokaryotes, UCLL1)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (34.04%) toBrevinin-2HS2or AP1854, Brevinin-2-OW3. GRAVY: -1.53; Mol formula: C209H358N72O66S2; M. Wt:  5038.697; molar extinction coefficient: 0.Activity: Diffusion zone assay: active against Gram+ S. aureus ATCC 29213, 25923 (21.4-21.6 mm), E. faecalis ATCC 29212 (12.6 mm), L. monocytogenes CMCC 54004 (19.5 mm), resistant S. aureus 1 (12.7 mm) and 3 (11.2 mm), Gram- E. coli ATCC 25922 (20.2 mm), Salmonella CMCC 50071 (26.7 mm), C. sakazakii ATCC 29544 (18.7 mm), also active against antibiotic0resistant C. sakazakii (17.9-22.3 mm) and Salmonella 557D (19.7 mm).
